title: Who are the best music artists you know? - Quora

response.answer_text: Know personally?  Fitzgerald and Beach.Page on myspace.com Whether playing blues, country, or rock, Fitz (now deceased) was a consummate finger picker.  His sense of humor tickled me.  He was a master of vocal and musical idioms.  Bob took a simple instrument, the harmonica, and mastered it.  He also plays some darn good flute. Brad Yoder.Albums | Brad YoderThe guy puts a lot of thought into his songs.  He'll play just about anywhere, solo guitar or with supporting musicians.  He's been pluggin' away for many years, and building a fan base. People I often listen to but don't know personally: Frank ZappaThe guy was amazing. in the complexity and variety of his compositions.  And he got some of the best players to work with him -- Chad Wackerman, Ed Mann, Ike Willis... too many to name.  Everything was precise.  Saw him live about five times.  Always the ultimate in precision. YesYeah, Yes can be pretentious.  But nobody does pretention better than Yes.  The raw talent in the band makes for amazing synergy. J. S. BachA lifelong favorite composer of mine.  As a bassist his counterpoint speaks to me. Beatles, of course.
